participant_1.background:
Rita Hayworth is my idol and I like to work out to stay in shape.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
my favorite genre of music is rock.
I like to play pretend with my daughter.
i recently had knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking.
i have 3 dogs.
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I'm better at making sounds with my armpits than I am at cooking.

content.text: Hi! How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm doing great! I just had knee surgery and I'm doing really well!
Oh no! I hope you have a speedy recovery!
Thank you! I'm very lucky to be able to walk again.
I'm glad to hear that!
What are your hobbies?
I enjoy making films, walking my dogs, and spending time outside.
That sounds great! I love to walk my dog as well. What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever, a corgi, and a poodle.
Those are all adorable breeds!
I know right! They're my best friends.
I'm sure they are!
They really are.
So, what kind of films do you like to make?
I really enjoy making short films. I'm not very good at writing scripts, so I usually just make them up as I go along.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try making a film, but I'm not sure where to start.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that!
Great! I'd love to see it when you're done.
I'll definitely let you know
